short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improves the user experience of YouTube: blocks ads, removes unrelated content, converts shorts to videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Better YouTube Chrome Extension adds several quality of life features to YouTube. 
Features:
  - Removes all unwanted ads 
  - Removes YouTube Shorts from the main page
  - Lets you turn YouTube Shorts into videos
  - Removes "Suggested videos" to optimize searches 
  - Adds the dislike button back
